manager.name: Discovery Coordinator
manager.description: Manages conversational discovery flow, validates user inputs, orchestrates analysis pipeline, aggregates results, and handles progressive disclosure of outputs

sub_agents.name: Document Ingestion Agent
sub_agents.description: Parses PDF/DOI/arXiv inputs, extracts structured content (title, authors, abstract, sections, references), performs strict validation, chunks long documents with context preservation

sub_agents.name: Understanding Agent
sub_agents.description: Analyzes paper structure, identifies problem statement, methodology, results, limitations, extracts key claims with section citations for grounding

sub_agents.name: Summarization Agent
sub_agents.description: Generates prompt-driven structured summaries adapted to user's specified focus areas, tone, and depth requirements while avoiding hallucinations

sub_agents.name: Recommendation Agent
sub_agents.description: Fetches related papers using hybrid similarity (semantic, citation, methodology, recency, impact, interdisciplinary), ranks and selects top 5 with relevance explanations

sub_agents.name: Quality Control Agent
sub_agents.description: Validates summary coherence, checks factual grounding against source sections, flags uncertainty, removes redundancy, ensures recommendations are genuinely relevant
